attributes.action: introduce legislation at UK level that would prohibit Members of Scottish Parliament from serving as Local Authority Councillors at the same time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being an elected Member of Scottish Parliament is a full time (and more) role, to do it effectivly a member must give it his all, the role of a MSP cannot and should not be seen to be a part time job.

Likewise, serving people as a Councillor is  a full time role, which is now salaried for all Councillors for the first time.

Lets bring an end to it now.

One person. One role.

Another petition calls on the Prime Minister to introduce legislation to prevent people from being an MSP and MP at the same time.
  http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/dualrolemembers/
